section.20: The Book of Qiyam Al-Lail (The Night Prayer) and Voluntary Prayers During the Day

hadiths.text: Sa'eed bin Abdur-Rahman bin Abza narrated from his father, that:Ubayy bin Ka'b said: "The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) used to recite in Witr: "Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High;" and "Say: O you disbelievers!;' and 'Say: He is Allah, (the) One
